TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void IconReleaseHandler(object o, IconReleaseArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed IconReleaseHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the IconReleaseHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the IconReleaseHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the IconReleaseHandler is removed from the event.
